author: Nicholas Ixo
comment: I find it's too cumbersome to create a reminder for many things throughout the day. The process of adding a new reminder is not streamlined. You have to do, what I would consider, a lot of clicking around which just make the app feel clunky. Setting a time is really obnoxious because they use slider bars. Overall needs a lot of work, imo.
title: It's not bad functionally, just more cumbersome than I had hoped

author: Papa Petrid
comment: I love this app. I feel that it is the best reminder that I could have. It is very reliable. The the only thing that I do not like about it is that I haven't yet discovered how to duplicate a reminder to create multiples, but with a different time for each one. Other than that, it's fantastic.

Please set the volume buttons to silence & snooze alarms even if screen is off, infact any hard buttons, this would really help in meetings or if you are just too busy to look at your phone & respond, thanks for the great app!
title: Use of Volume buttons to silence reminder

author: Vaishnavi Kanagaraj
comment: I set a birthday reminder and it either doesn't even ring. Reminder alarm never rings. Total waste.
title: Not performing basic functionality

author: Susan Copple
comment: You should make one that keeps the correct time, and that I don't have to constantly reinstall

author: Ripan Reet
comment: Amazing app to recall important stuff in day to day to life..

author: S SENTHIL BABU NAAIDU
comment: EXCELLENT APP also Need for Monthly & Yearly. Schedule. Thinking u  👌✋

comment: Overall experience is good !
title: Need some improvement

comment: Its rly nice and helps me remember things alot
Very easy and simple. Just what i wanted.. a basic reminder app. But how do you edit a reminder???

title: Good

title: Very good app, it reminds me accurately

comment: Interface is unusual. Gets the job done tho

comment: Good

author: Betty Harper
comment: This app is ok, but not great. It's not terribly intuitive to use. The most annoying thing is that it's alarm ignores the volume setting on your phone, so if you mute your phone this app will still make noise. Very embarrassing in important meetings.
title: Alarm ignores mute

author: Mordi Reches
comment: This app has had IMMENSELY immediate response in my life. It's easy too use and unbelievably productive.  Highly recommended! ANYONE WHO HAD PART OF MAKING THIS APP.....  THANK YOU MUCH!
title: The only app you will ever need

author: Swag
comment: Lacks basic features (i.e. one time notification) and is very invasive (i.e. reading conttex info when text arrives and forcefully asking if you would like to set a reminder. Awful. At least the interface is pretty.
title: Very unintuitive app

author: Nicky Raymond
comment: Loved it, but found without customized date options, it was hard to use for me.  For instance, I need an alarm for Sun - Thurs and could not get it to work right.  As it is not weekend or weekday only.
title: It's ok

author: Ed Grossheim
comment: Try it, no way to turn off coaching tips. No help, only choice is everyday for a remember. Turning off the alarm? Have fun.....
title: Another feature poor remind me app

author: Anurag Sonawane
comment: It worked initially for few days. But now it is not alarming any reminder. It is useless...
title: Not working

author: Lee Densmore
comment: Reminds me of people to call ..texts to send...appts. and it's very easy to read. I am a senior citizen and wasn't sure at first...looked confusing but I just went through the tutorial a few times and I love it!!
title: Remind me app

author: Jason Ellar
comment: It pops up every time I receive a text and means I can't continue what I'm doing. Why do I need a reminder every time I get a text?
title: Annoying

author: Gaurav Kumar Baranwal
comment: Pl remove it, if not working well. No option to remove it.
title: Alarm options is very bad..

author: Caspar Sugg
comment: The best I've seen hands down. I'm going to try it and see if it works for me. Any chance if a Evernote integration?
title: Very cool UI!!!!

author: pratty g
comment: I have to keep reminding the app to remind me! Is there any reminder app that actually works??
title: The title is apt

author: Vishnu Nair
comment: Nice UI and support but please add synchronization using mail or account since many switch between mobiles
title: Nice reminder

author: Mahbubul Khaled
comment: There is no option to choose week days. Can't find how to custom week days.
title: We want more

comment: This app is the only app ive found that does exactly what I need when setting effective reminders.
